articles.author: Varuni Khosla
articles.title: ‘Indian tourists to S. Africa could soar with direct flights’ | Mint - Mint
articles.description: South Africa expects travel from India to increase with the introduction of direct flights and a new e-visa pilot program.
articles.content: New Delhi: Eyeing a larger share of Indian travellers, South Africas tourism marketing promotion council said it expects that travel could jump manifold if direct flights from India are introduced. H… [+2171 chars]
